Joe Cloughley is a Product Designer in
San Francisco

Great experiences are discovered when
users are involved at every step.

Joe currently works as a product designer at Meta, designing intelligent solutions for the engineering and machine learning community. See his work below, download his Resume, or find him on Github.

Annotate Video 100x Faster

Product DesignUX Research

The Wyndcroft School
